greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000217(n) - A048702(n+1).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: A048702 := Join[{0}, Reap[For[k = 1, k < 1500, k += 2, bb = IntegerDigits[k, 2]; If[bb == Reverse[bb], If[EvenQ[Length[bb]], Sow[k/3]]]]][[2, 1]]]; Table[n*(n + 1)/2 - A048702[[n + 1]], {n, 0, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 26 2017 *)
xref: The positions of the zeros seem to be given by A000975. Also a(A000225(n)) = ((2^n)-1)*(2^(n-1)) - (2^(2n) - 1)/3 = A006095(n).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 02 2002
